gold.user: Alice wants to check the current invites sent to users in her Zulip organization to manage them effectively.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all invites currently sent, including their status and recipient details.

gold.user: Bob needs to invite new team members to his Zulip organization, so he prepares a list of email addresses to send invites.
gold.ideal: Successfully sends invites to the specified email addresses and returns a confirmation message.

gold.user: Charlie wants to create a multi-use invite link for a workshop, allowing multiple participants to join easily.
gold.ideal: Generates a multi-use invite link and returns the link along with its expiration details.

gold.user: Diana realizes that she sent an invite to the wrong email address and wants to revoke it.
gold.ideal: Successfully revokes the specified email invite and returns a confirmation of the action.

gold.user: Ethan needs to disable a multi-use invite link that he created earlier to prevent further access.
gold.ideal: Successfully revokes the specified multi-use invite link and confirms the revocation.

gold.user: Fiona wants to resend an invite to a colleague who didn't receive the original email.
gold.ideal: Successfully resends the email invite to the specified address and returns a confirmation message.
